metadata.title: CVE-2024-23076 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** JFreeChart v1.5.4 was discovered to contain aNullPointerException via the component/labels/BubbleXYItemLabelGenerator.java. NOTE: this is disputed by multiplethird parties who believe there was not reasonable evidence to determinethe existence of a vulnerability. The submission may have been based on atool that is not sufficiently robust for vulnerability identification.

criterions.comment: libjfreechart-java package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
